replies.body: Ok, you just ran akali back into the ground with this patch. Akali is so dependent on her Q healing the entire game and without it she is garbage. It would have been nice if you could have at least given us some power somewhere else in her kit. #BringBackOldAkali

They know. They've said explicitly that they're intentionally nerfing Akali into the ground so they can buff her back up. They'd rather her be bad for a patch and fix her later than guess what she needs and potentially overshoot the mark and have to go back _again_ and make more adjustments. 

They want to see Akali struggle without the crutches of free towerdives and free lane sustain so they know where she needs help the most.

Except she will be forever terrible without healing in her kit. She is a squishy assassin that half her dmg is in melee range. Now she will no longer be able to top because other laners will all in her with no sustain. Riot doesn't even listen to us when we ask them to switch the sustain to passive, or just reduce it. Not completely remove it.

But... she's an assassin, why is she top in the first place? So she can bully bruisers? There's a meta they want to follow and putting assassins top lane is not what they want. Part of why they reduced quinn's effectiveness top.

Can we get some clarification on Stormrazor's new Energized attack boost? Which parts of the energized attacks are increased? Does RFC's range bonus go to 45.5% and increase the bonus range cap to 195, or is only the bonus damage affected, or what? How about with Statikk Shiv? Does it allow you to hit 30% more targets with the lightning and target seek range is increased, or just the lightning damage? Will it make Fleet Footwork heal more?
Everything is increased including the RFC range and the Shiv targets hit.
Also, Shiv lightning will apply the slow to all targets hit.
Oh really? I was thinking it would just be the damage. Are you sure on the range increase? That would certainly make Stormrazor more worth picking than I thought initially.

So preliminary I like the changes, heavy handed as they may be on some.  The only thing I dont understand is why create spear of shojin?  The current essence reaver is an issue on everyone from jax to renekton to fiora and riven.  It's not that it was good on them, it made them oppressive because no matter how gold inefficient the base stats are, that passive might just be the most gold efficient thing I've ever seen in the game that isnt on a multi minute cooldown.  Champs that can get their ult down to under a minute at 40-45%cdr(triforce+spear+cosmic in sight) will almost permanently have it up and hell if you are beating a jax with a billion resist and near perma AA immunity.  The passive needs removed and something else more bruiser friendly that provides a point of weakness still added

Not to mention, IT GIVES HP NOW. Half of the people who abused ER didn't have mana problems but were squishy for getting it second item. Now that it gives 250HP that's hardly as big of an issue.
